byline.original: By MALIA WOLLAN, J. DAVID GOODMAN and SARAH MASLIN NIR

abstract: Police used tear gas on protesters at the Occupy Oakland movement on Tuesday, after clearing protesters from an area near city hall earlier in the day.
snippet: Police used tear gas on protesters at the Occupy Oakland movement on Tuesday, after clearing protesters from an area near city hall earlier in the day.
lead_paragraph: Last Updated 9:48 a.m. Riot police in Oakland dispersed hundreds of protesters with tear gas on Tuesday night as crowds tried to re-enter a plaza outside of City Hall that the authorities had cleared of an encampment earlier in the day.

headline.main: Police Fire Tear Gas at Occupy Protesters in Oakland
